channel.title: [HELP!]server problem
channel.description:
[b]Hi everyone I been having a problem with my server it was working for about 3 days and all out of no where it logged everyone off and now know one can get on the server including me,it is saying this![/b]
[IMG]http://i406.photobucket.com/albums/pp147/burntflamed/help.jpg[/img]
[b]If you have any idea's, about how fixing this problem please message me or post a comment below I really need your help.[/b]

item.title: [HELP!]server problem

Well that still shouldn’t cause it to send that message.

item.title: [HELP!]server problem
item.dc:creator: @bl00d_furyz bl00d furyz
item.description:
@bl00d_furyz wrote:

wow your such a mean person all i ask is 1 simple thing i just made this server and i havent had on for about 6 months[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 24, 2009, 11:23:16 am[/size][hr]well i found them now
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 24, 2009, 11:28:40 am[/size][hr]found them but i cant find nothing about it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 24, 2009, 11:38:06 am[/size][hr]w00t found the problem it was a problem in the port forward in linkis where somehow the ip adress went down 1 #

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP!]server problem
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

[quote="_, post:3, topic:285207"]It could be a loop that wasn’t executed properly that resulted in the loop. Find out the return code for that message, and just search returnCode = #; See what causes that error, and then fix it.

I gotta type faster…[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP!]server problem
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

It could be a loop that wasn’t executed properly that resulted in the loop. Find out the return code for that message, and just search returnCode = #; See what causes that error, and then fix it.

I gotta type faster…

Read full topic
